name: Mad Joker
description:
Mad Joker comes with easy and enjoyable gameplay in an amazing 2D environment.

The Game Describe the feeling of a Mad Man called "Joker" who has pissed of because of the cop's system and describe how the mess comes from a single crazy Man "Joker"

Dive into Game, with the Crazy Man, and defeat some of those Cops in pursuit of their leaders! There's plenty to find, but one misstep and it's all over.

Show everyone that you are crazy enough to mess with the whole City, using your skills on Guns, and keep in mind "Be The Joker himself" and do your job.

Enjoy the experience, LR Studio best regards.
